text: Archer Heights is a neighborhood in Chicago, Illinois. It is one of the 77 official community areas of Chicago. The area was once a Native American trail. The neighborhood is bounded by the Stevenson Expressway to the north, the CTA Orange Line to the south, the Corwith railyard to the east, and the railroad tracks/Knox Avenue to the west. ==References== ==Other websites== *Archer Heights neighborhood map & guide on ExploreChicago.org *Official City of Chicago Archer Heights Community Map Category:Community areas of Chicago
title: Archer Heights, Chicago
